A characteristic of X-linked inheritance is that fathers cannot pass X-linked traits to their sons.",GHR,Aarskog-Scott syndrome
What are the treatments for Aarskog-Scott syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Aarskog-Scott syndrome:  - Genetic Testing Registry: Aarskog syndrome  - MedlinePlus E
